trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Wichita
There were no other sightings in Wichita on or around February 11th 2007
divs: sighting detailskerwin reimer, male 35, reports repeatedly seeing bright lights in both the day and night sky that he believes have been following him around since the year 1997. reimer contacted kansas mufon assistant state director tracey c. smith by telephone on 02\11\2007 at approximately 1611 hrs. reimer stated that he was standing at the corner of 21st and n. oliver streets in wichita. reimer stated that "bright lights in the sky" had been watching him and following him all day, despite the fact that no one else could see them. reimer stated that this has been going on continually since 1997. reimer described a "mothership" that looked like a "bright cluster of bananas." at times, reimer sounded incoherent during the brief conversation. i advised him that i would take his information and thanked him for calling. this investigator has nothing further to report at this time. tracey c. smith assistant state director, kansas mufon
Summary: UFO witness claims to have been followed by bright lights in sky from 1997 to the present date.
